statements: SELECT * FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, traffic_speed FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring WHERE traffic_type = 'TCP';
SELECT destination_ip, source_ip, timestamp FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT quality_of_service FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, SUM(traffic_speed) AS total_traffic_speed FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring GROUP BY source_ip, destination_ip;
SELECT * FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring WHERE traffic_type = 'HTTP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, SUM(traffic_speed) AS total_speed FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring GROUP BY source_ip, destination_ip HAVING total_speed > 1000
SELECT DISTINCT source_ip FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring WHERE quality_of_service = 'High' ORDER BY source_ip ASC
SELECT destination_ip, AVG(traffic_speed) AS average_speed FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring GROUP BY destination_ip ORDER BY average_speed DESC
SELECT * FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND quality_of_service = 'Critical' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring
SELECT id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring WHERE traffic_amount > 100
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, SUM(traffic_amount) AS total_traffic FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring GROUP BY source_ip, destination_ip
SELECT * FROM QualityOfService WHERE status = 'good' ORDER BY response_time DESC
SELECT timestamp, service_type, AVG(response_time) AS avg_response_time FROM QualityOfService GROUP BY service_type
SELECT id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, traffic_amount FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM QualityOfService WHERE status = 'success' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, SUM(traffic_amount) AS total_traffic FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring GROUP BY source_ip ORDER BY total_traffic DESC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, MAX(traffic_amount) AS max_traffic FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring GROUP BY source_ip, destination_ip;
SELECT * FROM QualityOfService WHERE response_time > 100 AND status = 'failed';
SELECT * FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring WHERE timestamp > '2021-10-01' ORDER BY data_sent DESC;
SELECT device_id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring WHERE traffic_type = 'HTTP';
SELECT MAX(data_sent) AS max_data_sent FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, location FROM NetworkDevices ORDER BY device_name;
SELECT device_id, AVG(throughput) AS avg_throughput FROM QualityOfService GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring
SELECT device_id, timestamp, source_ip, data_sent FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, SUM(data_sent) as total_data_sent FROM NetworkTrafficMonitoring GROUP BY source_ip, destination_ip

SELECT NetworkDevices.device_name, NetworkTrafficMonitoring.source_ip, QualityOfService.throughput FROM NetworkDevices JOIN NetworkTrafficMonitoring ON NetworkDevices.device_id = NetworkTrafficMonitoring.device_id JOIN QualityOfService ON NetworkDevices.device_id = QualityOfService.device_id
SELECT * FROM QualityOfService WHERE latency > 10 ORDER BY throughput ASC
SELECT * FROM Network_Traffic_Monitoring ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, data_usage FROM Network_Traffic_Monitoring WHERE data_usage > 1000;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM Network_Devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT * FROM QoS_Management WHERE latency < 10 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT username, role FROM User_Permissions WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM Network_Traffic_Monitoring ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, SUM(data_usage) AS total_data_usage FROM Network_Traffic_Monitoring GROUP BY source_ip, destination_ip;
SELECT DISTINCT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM QoS_Management WHERE latency > 100 GROUP BY source_ip;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM Network_Devices WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT username, role FROM User_Permissions WHERE role = 'admin' OR role = 'manager';
SELECT * FROM NetworkDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_capacity > 100;
SELECT device_name, device_capacity FROM NetworkDevices ORDER BY device_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM NetworkTrafficLogs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT operator_name, operator_region FROM NetworkOperators WHERE operator_type = 'ISP';
SELECT * FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT device_name, device_capacity FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY device_name DESC;

SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS num_metrics FROM NetworkDevices JOIN NetworkPerformanceMetrics ON NetworkDevices.device_id = NetworkPerformanceMetrics.device_id GROUP BY device_name HAVING num_metrics > 2;
SELECT operator_name, operator_region FROM NetworkOperators WHERE operator_type = 'ISP' AND operator_region LIKE 'North%';
SELECT log_timestamp, traffic_data FROM NetworkTrafficLogs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
